subjects.label: cars
texts: I spent the weekend comparing electric sedans by battery range and charging speed.
Brake pads, tire pressure, and wheel alignment changed how my car handles at highway speed.
I prefer manual transmission sports cars because engine response and cornering feel are better.

subjects.label: java_programming
texts: In Java 21 I used records and pattern matching to simplify domain model code.
Our Spring Boot service failed a JUnit test because dependency injection was misconfigured.
Gradle build caching improved compile times for our JVM microservices project.

subjects.label: going_out
texts: We booked a rooftop bar downtown with live DJ sets and craft cocktails.
The club line was long, but the dance floor and late night music were worth it.
I like planning weekend nightlife with restaurant reservations before going out with friends.

subjects.label: classical_music
texts: The orchestra performed Beethoven symphonies with a strong string section and precise tempo.
I enjoyed the piano concerto because the conductor balanced dynamics across the ensemble.
Chamber music for violin and cello sounded intimate compared with full symphony works.
